effect.scarlet_violet: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.

If the target’s Attack is already at -6, this move will fail. In any other situation that would prevent a stat modification, the healing will still succeed.

effect.mega_dimension: Lowers the target’s Attack by one stage. Heals the user by the target’s current Attack, including modifiers, but not including this move’s Attack-lowering effect. short_effect.scarlet_violet: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

short_effect.mega_dimension: Heals the user by the target’s current Attack stat and lowers the target’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user restores its own HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It then lowers the target's Attack stat.
